title: style saltimbocca with caramelised pear, fried sage and vignarola
description: This is a classic Roman dish that looks very impressive but is easy to make. For this recipe you will need 4 cocktail sticks.
ingredients: ½ pear (ideally Williams), peeled, cored and cut into small chunks
salt and freshly ground black pepper
3 salted anchovies, rinsed and cut into 1cm/½in pieces
100g/3½oz pancetta or smoked bacon, cut into cubes
200g/7oz broad beans or edamame, defrosted if frozen
3 large globe artichoke hearts, cut into 1cm/½in slices and placed in acidulated water
